mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.price, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, s.title as subjectLevelOne, ss.title as subjectLevelTwo, t.name as teacherName, c.cover FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description d ON c.id = d.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON c.subject_parent_id = s.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ss ON c.subject_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE c.id = #{couseId}
